feed.title: 浮声新志
feed.subtitle: 山峰永不相遇，而人人却处处相逢。

entry.title: webpack入门篇：多页面的资源分离引用（js/css按需引用）
entry.id: http://www.fedjs.com/2017/02/webpack入门篇：多页面的资源分离引用（js-css按需引用）/
entry.content:
新建 index.html:

修改 webpack.config.js 配置文件:

这样执行webpack命令后，生成的2个目标文件（index-build.html，login-build.html），有什么问题呢？

2个文件都引入了所有的js和css。

下面我们要做到按需引用，不同的html模板引入仅它自己需要的css和js

  1. 为index.html新建一个index.css:

  2. 为index.html新建index.js，并在其中引入index.css:

  3. 编辑webpack.config.js，为不同的html模板指定不同的配置节点

  4. 执行webpack之后

查看index-build.html中只引入了index.css和index.js

entry.title: webpack插件篇：NoErrorsPlugin详解
entry.content:
用途说明

NoErrorsPlugin ()

When there are errors while compiling this plugin skips the emitting phase (and recording phase), so there are no assets emitted that include errors. The emitted flag in the stats is false for all assets. If you are using the CLI, the webpack process will not exit with an error code by enabling this plugin. If you want webpack to “fail” when using the CLI, please check out the bail option.

webpack.config.js配置

案例
entry.summary:
用途说明

NoErrorsPlugin ()

When there are errors while compiling

entry.title: webpack插件篇：ExtendedAPIPlugin详解
entry.content:
用途说明

ExtendedAPIPlugin ()

Adds useful free vars to the bundle.

__webpack_hash__ The hash of the compilation available as free var.

WARNING: Don’t combine it with the HotModuleReplacementPlugin. It would break and you don’t need it as the HotModuleReplacementPlugin export the same stuff.

webpack.config.js配置

案例
